findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in approve function

findings.title: Unprotected Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function is publicly accessible without any restrictions, allowing unauthorized users to transfer tokens.

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Unprotected Mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is accessible and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as vulnerable and requires further review.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'set'
findings.description: The 'set' function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected 'remove' Function
findings.description: The 'remove' function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Constructor
findings.description: The constructor function has public visibility and does not have any access modifiers.

findings.title: excludeFromDividends
findings.description: The excludeFromDividends function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: Unprotected Function: includeInDividends
findings.description: The function includeInDividends is declared as external and can be called by anyone, including malicious actors.
